title: LOTTE EBC #1
subtitle: Lotte Executive Briefing Center : WELCOME
head_desc:
Our project focuses on the creation of a media space and content production that allows our VIP customers to experience the essence of LOTTE Group's values and vision. 

At the LOTTE Executive Briefing Center, we've designed a unique space where you can engage with the rich history, innovation, and global impact that define LOTTE Group.
content:
ABOARD spearheaded the media content creation project for the revamped LOTTE EBC on the 113th floor of LOTTE Tower.

We've designed innovative media content for two key areas:

The Welcome Zone, where we extend a warm welcome to our VIP guests.
The PR Zone, where visitors can experience LOTTE's values and vision through tailored media messages.
In the Welcome Zone, the iconic LOTTE World Tower in Seoul is transformed into a captivating and beautiful panorama through transparent displays, showcasing a vibrant array of patterns.
LOTTE Group's businesses are visually represented through trendy objects and dynamic motions, creating a spectacular presentation of materials and properties.
Transparent displays recreate the awe-inspiring sky view from the 113th floor, symbolizing LOTTE's boundless potential and limitless opportunities.
foot_desc: We are a digital-oriented communication media group. Explore new trends in communications and develop evolving media platforms. Leveraging technology to connect brands and consumers Present solutions from a new perspective.
